pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate Parameters of Mixtures of Logistic Regressions // Mixture of logistic regressions parameters (H)estimation with (U)spectral methods. The main methods take d-dimensional inputs and a vector of binary outputs, and return parameters according to the GLMs mixture model (General Linear Model). For more details see chapter 3 in the PhD thesis of Mor-Absa Loum: https://www.theses.fr/s156435, available here https://theses.hal.science/tel-01877796/document.
